title: "Machine Learning Accelerates Drug Formulation Development, Changing the Game for Pharmaceutical Research"
excerpt: "New study demonstrates the potential for machine learning to accelerate the development of innovative drug delivery technologies. Scientists at the University of Toronto have successfully tested the use of machine learning models to guide the design of long-acting injectable drug formulations."
